name: Get Your Head Around These! Quiz | Brain Teasers | 5 Questions

questions.text:
I can be seen when it's cold, but not when hot.			
You need me to live - take your last and you're not.
questions.explanation:
breath & breaths.

	Breath is visible in a cold atmosphere because the moisture within it condenses.

questions.text: If one=3, two=3, three=5, and four=4, what do five + six = ?
questions.explanation:
seven & 7  & five & 5.

	The numbers relate to the number of letters in each word: one=3 (letters), two=3 (letters) etc.  Therefore, five(=4) + six(=3) = 7 (letters).An alternate interpretation would be five (=4) + six (=3) = seven (=5)(letters in the word seven).

questions.text:
I sound like a word of one letter, but I'm actually three.
Look the same from both ends - I'm a palindrome  you  see.
Take me from there, and you end up here.
questions.correct: t & the letter t & letter t
questions.explanation:
t & the letter t & letter t.

	Remove the letter 't' from there and you get here.

questions.text:
Add a letter to one, place it with care.
Use the right letter - it's no longer there.
questions.explanation:
gone & none & g & n.

	Add a g-one, or n-one.
